Interface ReportHandler

    static double
    getTotalGrades(String packageName)
    Gets the total awarded grades from all classes, methods, and fields.
    All Grade.marksAwarded() values within the given package will be summed and returned as a double value.

  • Method Details

    • generateReport

      @SafeVarargs static Report generateReport(Teacher teacher, Student student, String packageName, double overallGrade, Class<? extends Annotation>... annotations)
      Generate a report object containing all attributes associated with grading an assignment.
      An example of creating a new Report with 2 annotation classes: 
       var report = new Report( teacher, student, "com.example", 79.5, Feedback.class, Grade.class );
      Parameters:
      teacher - The teacher grading the assignment
      student - The student who authored the assignment
      packageName - The package name where the assignment files can be found
      overallGrade - The overall grade being awarded for the assignment
      annotations - One or more annotation classes to be included in the report
      Returns:
      A Report instance
      See Also:
      • AnnotationHandler
      • More about varargs

    • getTotalGrades

      static double getTotalGrades(String packageName)
      Gets the total awarded grades from all classes, methods, and fields.
      All Grade.marksAwarded() values within the given package will be summed and returned as a double value.
      Parameters:
      packageName - The package to scan
      Returns:
      The sum of all awarded marks
